expeditionNameId.Wiki: The expedition name for this night boss.

unlockEventFlag.Wiki: The event flag sthat unlocks this night boss as an expedition.

defeatEventFlag.Wiki: The event flag set upon defeating this night boss.

bossNameId.Wiki: The boss name for this night boss.

descriptionId.Wiki: The boss description for this night boss.

bossIconId.Wiki: The icon to display for this night boss in the Expedition menu.

defeatedBossIconId.Wiki: The icon to display for this night boss in the Expedition menu when defeated.

sortId.Wiki: The ordering in the Expedition Menu.

expeditionBackgroundId.Wiki: The background to display for this night boss in the Expedition menu.

largeBossIconId.Wiki: The icon to display for this night boss in the Expedition menu.

effectiveAffinity1.Wiki: Icon to display in Effective section

effectiveAffinity2.Wiki: Icon to display in Effective section
